title: Java Level 3 â€” Loops & Simple Algorithms
concept: for/while loops, counting, sums, simple patterns.

challenges.title: Sum from 1 to N
Factorial
Count Digits
challenges.description: Given integer n (non-negative), count number of digits.

challenges.title: Power of Two
challenges.description: Given integer n, print YES if n is a power of 2 (1,2,4,8,...) else NO.

challenges.title: Multiplication Table
challenges.description: Given n, print its multiplication table from 1 to 10 (one per line).

challenges.title: Reverse Digits
challenges.description: Given a non-negative integer n, print the number formed by its digits in reverse order.

challenges.title: Sum of Even Numbers
challenges.description: Given n, print the sum of all even numbers from 1 to n.

challenges.title: Count Divisors
challenges.description: Given n, count its positive divisors.

challenges.title: Prime or Not
challenges.description: Given n, print YES if n is prime, else NO.

challenges.title: Fibonacci Nth Term
challenges.description: Given n, print nth Fibonacci number (F1 = 0, F2 = 1).
